page.title: 09INDUSTRY TRAILER TENTS
page.content: {CREIGHTON-BINNS Mr.Binns first came to Cowling about ten years ago to set up a business making trailer tents.When he first started he had only a small part of a large mill which had been used to produce textiles.His workshop was only just large enough to make one trailer tent.The rest of the mill was still used for weaving.Now all the mill buildings are used for this one business,and include an area for welding the steel for the chassis Upstairs is a big sewing room,and the only things not made there are the wheels and jockey wheel. One of the small trailers can be towed by a motor bike.All the trailers take only about 3 minutes to erect,after between 80 and 90 hours to construct. Eleven people,including family,now work there Below there is an old water wheel.
